JOB DESCRIPTION:
Jr. Software Engineer Trainee

We are looking for Energetic,  Enthusiastic and Motivated minds,  to be a part of our Family. Are you crazy about Linux and Open Source Do you spend hours tweaking your computer and gizmos Do you eat,  breathe and sleep online Are you eager to find out what happens in back end,  when you surf online If you do,  a career awaits you in Poornam! Eligibility Criteria B.Tech /  B.E in CS /  IT /  Electronics 65% aggregate throughout academics Knowledge in Linux /  Unix /  Windows /  Networking preferable Ready to be based in Cochin,  Kerala
